google_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynn
google_reviews.review: I don't recommend any place where a manger/owner allows there maintenance man too block delivery drivers in for 45 minutes because the delivery driver parked in a employee parking spot too help a resident of there's carry up 8 bags of groceries to the third floor cause this place offers no help or carts for there seniors. That type of kid behavior isn't where I would want any family of mine or my worst enemy. They have a lot of growing up too do it seems. Very sad and disgusting behavior considering it's a facility for our elderly.

owner_response.text:
I apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced regarding parking in our community. To ensure a smoother experience, I invite you to visit our leasing office so we can review our parking policies for service providers who assist residents with tasks such as grocery delivery.

We have numerous service providers who support our residents, and typically, adherence to standard parking regulations ensures a seamless process. It's important for each service provider to supply their own equipment necessary for their services.

By discussing our parking guidelines together, we aim to prevent any future misunderstandings and ensure compliance with our community's rules. Your cooperation is appreciated, and we look forward to resolving this matter amicably.

google_reviews.author: Ronita Phillips
google_reviews.review: We were looking for a 1 bedroom for my mother. During the tour, Jackie, the Community Director, was very friendly and helpful. She explained the application process thoroughly and was extremely patient with my mother. It was a great experience.

owner_response.text: We are sincerely grateful for your wonderful feedback and thrilled to hear that Jackie was able to assist you so effectively in finding a suitable 1 bedroom place for your mother. It is always our aim to provide thorough explanations of our processes and be patient with all individuals involved. Thank you once again, we're delighted we could make it a great experience for you and your mother.

google_reviews.author: Sandra Sowada
google_reviews.review: I met with Jackie and she explained the apartment application process in clear understandable language but also with warmth and clarity about the property and how living at Vintage might be for me. On the tour she showed me everything and every where, even the trash room (which was clean and freshly scrubbed). When we passed other residents they greeted each other and it was evident Jackie has a great relationship with them. The building is in excellent shape even taking in its age; No obvious wear and tear or deferred maintenance. I am looking forward to a future with my dog living at Vintage Bellingham.

owner_response.text: Thank you Sandra for the 5 star review!  We look forward to having you be part of our community!

google_reviews.author: LER

The property is very clean and well-maintained so I would feel safe living there. There are  also lots of fun activities to join in on.  Very good impression...

owner_response.text:

google_reviews.author: Christine Bickel
google_reviews.review: The manager, Jackie, is great and made the application/move in process for my dad super easy! I'm so happy he'll be living at Vintage at Bellingham - the building is clean and well maintained, the grounds are beautiful, and it's convenient for his needs.

owner_response.text: Thank you for the 5 Star review!  It is so nice to have your dad here.  If he needs anything, we are here for him!

google_reviews.author: Anne Steirer
google_reviews.review: Im grateful to live in my quiet, safe and clean building, thanks to the careful attention to details by Jackie, our marvelous, calm, caring and efficient Community Director. The experienced maintenance crew work to care for the indoors as well as the outdoor lawn, flowers and trees during every season. Friendly, interesting tenants daily enjoy a variety of active or quiet pursuits. Meet them at coffee hour, bingo, dominoes, card games, pool table, WII bowling, movies, books, puzzles and Seahawks pep rallies.

owner_response.text: Hi Anne,  Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We do the best we can.  Thank you for being such a wonderful resident!

yelp_reviews.author: Leslie W.
yelp_reviews.review: I have lived at the Vintage in Bellingham for the last five years and love it. Jackie our manager is great and David our maintenance guy is helpful to us old folks :) The apartments are very nice and the grounds lovely. I have made some great friends and that is important as you age and need to rely on others more often, we are all in the same boat!

owner_response.text: Thank you for the 5-star review, Leslie!  We love having you at the Vintage at Bellingham.  We are thrilled that you appreciate us.

summary.text:
Good

The Vintage at Bellingham has received positive remarks for its well-maintained facilities and friendly management staff. Many users highlight the responsiveness of management, specifically singling out the Community Director, Jackie, for her attentive and patient approach during property tours and application processes. Residents appreciate her efforts in keeping the grounds and building clean, noting that the property looks great even during the fall season when maintenance can be challenging.

The maintenance team has also been commended for their promptness in addressing issues. A user shared their satisfaction with how quickly their maintenance concerns were resolved, which contributed to a positive living experience. There are numerous activities available for residents, fostering a sense of community that many respondents find enjoyable and comforting.

Great

The overall sentiment among many residents points to an excellent living environment at Vintage at Bellingham, where the combination of nice apartments and community activities enhances their quality of life. User reviews emphasize the importance of social connections formed among residents, with one tenant noting the supportive and friendly atmosphere. Remarkably, Jackie has been highlighted as a key factor in providing personalized attention to each resident's needs and feelings of well-being.
